Specification: Surrounded by tranquil gardens and soaked in sunshine, this single level home offers a comfortable lifestyle for families with the perfect balance of indoor and outdoor space, while its 729sqm approx. allotment may entice a future extension, rebuild or redevelopment (STCA). ,Proudly placed in the Brentwood Secondary Zone (STSA), the home's wide frontage is overlooked by a wide entry porch where you're invited inside and enticed through to the lounge room displaying polished hardwood floorboards. ,Neatly presented with a LaGermania oven/gas stove and Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, the kitchen is accompanied by a dining zone where you'll find sliding doors opening into the sunroom, the perfect setting for relaxing with friends. ,During those warmer summer days, a covered alfresco deck encourages outdoor entertaining and enjoys the benefits of a bench seat with storage, while the backyard is complemented by a gazebo. ,Clustered together in the hallway, the three bedrooms are comforted by carpet and serviced by a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Other features include split system heating/air conditioning, high ceilings, storage shed plus a carport with gated access through to the backyard. ,Tucked in a quiet pocket, close to Glen Waverley South Primary, Brentwood Secondary, Caulfield Grammar, The Glen, Jells Park, bus stops, Glen Waverley Station and freeway access points. ,
